Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Erotic \E*rot"ic\, Erotical \E*rot"ic*al\, a. [Gr. ?: cf. F. ['e]rotique. See {Eros}.] Of or pertaining to the passion of love; treating of love; amatory. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Erotic \E*rot"ic\, n. An amorous composition or poem. [1913 Webster]
erotic adj : giving sexual pleasure; sexually arousing [syn: {titillating}]
